node.title: Secrets of Ancient Scrolls, Part 1
node.description: In the mid-nineteenth century the critics of the Bible were having a hay-day. On every side there were voices asserting that the Bible was a forgery, a fraud, and that it couldn’t have been written when Christians claimed it had been written, soon after the time of Christ. In this sermon we follow the efforts of one determined German professor in his quest to find evidence demonstrating the authenticity of the Bible.
